spell_tooltip.description: Transcendence: Transfer can now be cast if you are stunned. Cooldown reduced by 15 sec if you are not.
Thunder Focus Tea provides immunity to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Celestial Conduit now prevents all crowd control for its duration.

Heals the target for 1.4 million over 10.3 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.4 million over 10.3 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 330,662 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 326,317 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 186,692 Nature damage to all enemies, and 198,775 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 390,091 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 272,250 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.2 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 198,701 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 3.6 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 108,447, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 107,985. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 106,648.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.2 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

You consume a healing elixir when you drop below 40% health or generate excess healing elixirs, instantly healing you for 15% of your maximum health.

You generate 1 healing elixir every 30 sec, stacking up to 2 times.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 25 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 106,073, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 128,280 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.8 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 120,406 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 72,043 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 148,643 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.

5% of your overhealing done onto targets with Soothing Mist is spread to 3 nearby injured allies.

Soothing Mist now follows the target of your Enveloping Mist or Vivify and its channel time is increased by 4 sec.
Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 20,506, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

The August Celestials empower you, causing you to radiate 4.6 million healing onto up to 5 injured allies and 3 million Nature damage onto enemies within 20 yds over 3.4 sec, split evenly among them. Healing and damage increased by 6% per target, up to 30%.

You may move while channeling, but casting other healing or damaging spells cancels this effect.
The healing of Enveloping Mist and Vivify is increased by 6%.

Tiger Palm and Vivify have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for 243,731 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 200% of the damage done.

Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Refreshing Jade Wind while Chi-Ji, the Red Crane or Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent is active.
Sheilun's Gift calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for up to 8 sec, based on the clouds of mist consumed.
After Xuen assists you, your next Enveloping Mist's cast time is reduced by 50% and causes Niuzao to grant an absorb shield to 5 nearby allies for 3% of your maximum health.
Refreshing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to grant you a stack of Mana Tea and quickly rush to 5 allies, healing each target for 108,305.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Crane Stance:
Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
